Interface IArea<T>

interface IArea<T> {
    enableFullscreen?: boolean;
    id: string;
    isLocked?: boolean;
    position?: Point;
    previousLayout?: {
        [key: string]: AreaLayout | AreaRowLayout;
    };
    previousRootId?: null | string;
    raised?: boolean;
    role?: AreaRole;
    size?: {
        height: number;
        width: number;
    };
    spaceId?: null | string;
    state?: Record<string, any>;
    type: T;
    viewport?: Rect;
}
